mapper.sql: id, uid, password, balance, createDate, createTime, modifyDate, modifyTime, token
mapper.insert:

id,
uid,
password,
balance,
createDate,

mapper.update:
update t_user
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=BIGINT},
createDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=CHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR},
modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_user set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=CHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update t_user set modifyDate = current_date , modifyTime = current_time where uid = #{uid}
